attributes.action: Make lending at over 30% illegal, re-enfrancjise all adults into the banking system, create a social bank, esp. in Lloyds & RBS using "bonus matching"
attributes.additional_details: Lending at over 30% to be made illegal. All banks to pay 100% of bonus payments plus 100% of all staff benefits over £250000 annually, into a "social bank" or division, which will lend to disadvantaged/disenfranchised/non-qualifying people largely "as of right" within certain parameters, to replace the peripheral lenders. This is not a tax, simply an allocation of capital which the banks should even make money out of this. Further, it should be mandatory that any UK bank will open a bank account and grant a debit card to any UK citizen. All current lending at in excess of 30% rates should be repaid by the newly created bank funds (fully, as of right), thereby replacing >30% rate loans with ones from reputable lenders. Most appropriate way to balance the bonuses with those with most need. Removes parasite lenders. Protects the most vulnerable.
